    • Method Detail

      • getSectionNumber

        public int getSectionNumber()
        Get Section Number: Retrieves the section number of the section.
        Returns:
        The section number.

      • modifyUsersProduct

        public void modifyUsersProduct(BibliographicProduct product)
        Modify User's Product: Modifies a user's purchased product in the section.
        Preconditions:
        The product must exist in the section.
        Postconditions:
        The user's product is modified with the new product data.
        Parameters:
        product - The new product data to replace the user's product.

      • searchPurshased

        public BibliographicProduct searchPurshased(BibliographicProduct product)
        Search a bibliographic product acquire: Searches for a purchased BibliographicProduct with the same identifier as the specified BibliographicProduct.
        Postconditions:
        If a purchased BibliographicProduct with the same identifier as the specified BibliographicProduct is found, it is returned.
        Parameters:
        product - The BibliographicProduct to search for.
        Returns:
        The purchased BibliographicProduct with the same identifier as the specified BibliographicProduct, or null if none is found.

      • searchPurshased

        public BibliographicProduct searchPurshased(int row,
                                            int columns)
        Search Purchased Product: Searches for a purchased product at the specified row and column in the section.
        Parameters:
        row - The row index of the purchased product.
        columns - The column index of the purchased product.
        Returns:
        The purchased product at the specified row and column, or null if it doesn't exist.

      • acquireProuct

        public void acquireProuct(BibliographicProduct product)
        Comprobation of user's acquire products: Determines if the given bibliographic product has been purchased by the user.
        Preconditions:
        A bibliographic product must be passed as a parameter.
        Postconditions:
        A boolean indicating whether or not the product has been purchased is returned.
        Parameters:
        product - A BibliographicProduct object representing the product to check for purchase.

      • sectionVerification

        public boolean sectionVerification()
        Section Verification: Checks if the section has any available space for purchasing products.
        Returns:
        true if there is available space, false otherwise.

      • finishSuscription

        public boolean finishSuscription(BibliographicProduct product)
        Finish Subscription: Removes the specified product from the purchased products in the section.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to be removed from the purchased products.
        Returns:
        true if the product was successfully removed, false otherwise.

      • productsLibrary

        public java.lang.String productsLibrary()
        Products Library: Generates a string representation of the products in the section.
        Returns:
        The string representation of the products in the section.

      • simulateReading

        public java.lang.String simulateReading(BibliographicProduct product)
        Simulate Reading: Simulates a reading session with the specified product.
        Parameters:
        product - The product being read.
        Returns:
        A string representing the reading session.

      • publicationDateVerification

        public void publicationDateVerification(BibliographicProduct product)
        Publication Date Verification: Checks the publication date of the product and rearranges the purchased products accordingly.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to be verified and rearranged.

      • verification

        public boolean verification(BibliographicProduct product)
        Verification: Checks if the product should be rearranged based on its publication date.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to be verified.
        Returns:
        true if the product needs to be rearranged, false otherwise.
